ayahs.textUthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَوَهَبْنَا [And We granted] لَهُۥٓ [[to] him] أَهْلَهُۥ [his family] وَمِثْلَهُم [and a like of them] مَّعَهُمْ [with them] رَحْمَةًۭ [a Mercy] مِّنَّا [from Us] وَذِكْرَىٰ [and a Reminder] لِأُو۟لِى [for those of understanding] ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ [for those of understanding]
ayahs.transliteration: Wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamithlahummaAAahum rahmatan minna wathikrali-olee al-albab

ayahs.textUthmani: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَـٰهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَخُذْ [And take] بِيَدِكَ [in your hand] ضِغْثًۭا [a bunch] فَٱضْرِب [and strike] بِّهِۦ [with it] وَلَا [and (do) not] تَحْنَثْ ۗ [break (your) oath] إِنَّا [Indeed, We] وَجَدْنَـٰهُ [[We] found him] صَابِرًۭا ۚ [patient] نِّعْمَ [an excellent] ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ [slave] إِنَّهُۥٓ [Indeed, he] أَوَّابٌۭ [repeatedly turned]
ayahs.transliteration: Wakhuth biyadika dighthan fadribbihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiranniAAma alAAabdu innahu awwab

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَـٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And remember] عِبَـٰدَنَآ [Our slaves] إِبْرَٰهِيمَ [Ibrahim] وَإِسْحَـٰقَ [and Isaac] وَيَعْقُوبَ [and Ayyub] أُو۟لِى [possessors] ٱلْأَيْدِى [(of) strength] وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ [and vision]
ayahs.transliteration: Wathkur AAibadanaibraheema wa-ishaqa wayaAAqooba olee al-aydee wal-absar

ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّآ [Indeed, We] أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم [[We] chose them] بِخَالِصَةٍۢ [for an exclusive (quality)] ذِكْرَى [remembrance] ٱلدَّارِ [(of) the Home]
وَإِنَّهُمْ [And indeed, they] عِندَنَا [to Us] لَمِنَ [(are) from] ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ [the chosen ones] ٱلْأَخْيَارِ [the best]

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And remember] إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ [Ishmael] وَٱلْيَسَعَ [and Elisha] وَذَا [and Dhul-kifl] ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ [and Dhul-kifl] وَكُلٌّۭ [and all] مِّنَ [(are) from] ٱلْأَخْيَارِ [the best]
ayahs.transliteration: Wathkur ismaAAeelawa-ilyasaAAa watha alkifli wakullun mina al-akhyar

ayahs.textUthmani: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا [This] ذِكْرٌۭ ۚ [(is) a Reminder] وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لِلْمُتَّقِينَ [for the righteous] لَحُسْنَ [surely, is a good] مَـَٔابٍۢ [place of return]
جَنَّـٰتِ [Gardens] عَدْنٍۢ [(of) Eternity] مُّفَتَّحَةًۭ [(will be) opened] لَّهُمُ [for them] ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ [the gates]

ayahs.textUthmani: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ [Reclining] فِيهَا [therein] يَدْعُونَ [they will call] فِيهَا [therein] بِفَـٰكِهَةٍۢ [for fruit] كَثِيرَةٍۢ [many] وَشَرَابٍۢ [and drink]
ayahs.transliteration: Muttaki-eena feeha yadAAoona feehabifakihatin katheeratin washarab

ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ [And with them] قَـٰصِرَٰتُ [(will be) companions of modest gaze] ٱلطَّرْفِ [(will be) companions of modest gaze] أَتْرَابٌ [well-matched]
هَـٰذَا [This] مَا [(is) what] تُوعَدُونَ [you are promised] لِيَوْمِ [for (the) Day] ٱلْحِسَابِ [(of) Account]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] لَرِزْقُنَا [(is) surely Our provision] مَا [not] لَهُۥ [for it] مِن [any] نَّفَادٍ [depletion]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna hatha larizquna malahu min nafad

ayahs.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا ۚ [This (is so)] وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لِلطَّـٰغِينَ [for the transgressors] لَشَرَّ [surely (is) an evil] مَـَٔابٍۢ [place of return]
جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] يَصْلَوْنَهَا [they will burn therein] فَبِئْسَ [and wretched (is)] ٱلْمِهَادُ [the resting place]
هَـٰذَا [This (is so)] فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ [Then let them taste it] حَمِيمٌۭ [boiling fluid] وَغَسَّاقٌۭ [and purulence]
وَءَاخَرُ [And other] مِن [of] شَكْلِهِۦٓ [its type] أَزْوَٰجٌ [(of various) kinds]

ayahs.textUthmani: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ
ayahs.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا [This] فَوْجٌۭ [(is) a company] مُّقْتَحِمٌۭ [bursting] مَّعَكُمْ ۖ [(in) with you] لَا [No] مَرْحَبًۢا [welcome] بِهِمْ ۚ [for them] إِنَّهُمْ [Indeed, they] صَالُوا۟ [(will) burn] ٱلنَّارِ [(in) the Fire]
ayahs.transliteration: Hatha fawjun muqtahimunmaAAakum la marhaban bihim innahum saloo annar

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They say] بَلْ [Nay] أَنتُمْ [You ] لَا [no] مَرْحَبًۢا [welcome] بِكُمْ ۖ [for you] أَنتُمْ [You] قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ [brought this] لَنَا ۖ [upon us] فَبِئْسَ [So wretched (is)] ٱلْقَرَارُ [the settlement]
ayahs.transliteration: Qaloo bal antum la marhabanbikum antum qaddamtumoohu lana fabi/sa alqarar

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِى ٱلنَّارِ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They will say] رَبَّنَا [Our Lord] مَن [whoever] قَدَّمَ [brought] لَنَا [upon us] هَـٰذَا [this] فَزِدْهُ [increase for him] عَذَابًۭا [a punishment] ضِعْفًۭا [double] فِى [in] ٱلنَّارِ [the Fire]
ayahs.transliteration: Qaloo rabbana man qaddama lanahatha fazidhu AAathaban diAAfan fee annar
